mapper.select: SELECT a.order_num orderNum FROM sys_eve_menu a WHERE a.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY a.order_num DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.desktop_id desktopId, a.level FROM sys_eve_menu a
,sys_eve_menu b
WHERE a.parent_id = #{parentId}
AND b.id = #{parentId} AND (b.level + 1) = a.level
ORDER BY a.order_num ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) roleNum FROM sys_eve_role_menu d WHERE d.menu_id = #{id}

SELECT b.id, b.order_num orderNum, a.order_num thisOrderNum FROM sys_eve_menu a, sys_eve_menu b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND b.parent_id = a.parent_id AND a.order_num > b.order_num ORDER BY b.order_num DESC LIMIT 1
